articles.description:
🚨 P21: Simplifying Governance
In summary, this proposal:
- Speeds up Governance (15 > 10 days)
- Reduces threshold for members to elevate proposals to Snapshot (50k > 25k $CODE)
Please exercise your Gov rights and cast your votes 🙏🏼 https://buff.ly/3W4gBU8

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Wesley ✈️
Following @Rahatcodes' example, I'll give away my $CODE allocation
✨ a total of 4 @developer_dao memberships 
(I'll double the 800 tokens I got from the airdrop)
Similar rules as Rahat 👀
- NO DMs
- Reply what you're working on and how you think D_D can help
- winners by EOY
rahat.eth: In December I am going to personally give away 10 @developer_dao memberships using my $Code token allocation. 
One way to get into Developer DAO is by owning 400 $Code Tokens. See thread below on how to enter, make sure you actually read through everything.
